item.title: 3 - Good Programming
item.description: Good Programming Practices and Reproducible Research are worth YOUR time. They will save YOUR bacan. This is worth the read!! https://www.stat.ubc.ca/~jenny/STAT545A/block19_codeFormattingOrganization.html I could end here and be done. This says it all. The only thing I want to emphasize is file organization. You will develop your own preferences, but it is a good habit to get into early. Here is one I have seen multiple times: As expanded on here: https://www.
